title: Crime victim table - regression to the mean

content.prompt: As more participants provide their ratings, which of the following results could the psychologist expect to find?

choices.label: The mean ratings for Group A will decrease and the mean ratings for Group B will increase.
Group A participants will become less susceptible to social desirability effects.
The participants will become less representative of the larger population.

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
